channel.title: Error when adding an Item
channel.description:
item = 6737 Berserker_Ring A_ring_reputed_to_bring_out_a_berserk_fury_in_its_wearer. 6000 6000 8000 2 2 2 2 2 4 4 10 10 4 15
Why is it that when I add this into my item.cfg file it gives me the following error...
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException :17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:308) at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:36) at server.main(server.java:28)
But yet the item right before that one is: item = 6735 Archer_Ring A_fabled_ring_that_improves_the_wearer's_skill_with_a_bow. 6000 6000 8000 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 10 2 2 So I don't understand why that one works but item id 6737 doesn't..... Can anyone help please?

item.title: Error when adding an Item
item.dc:creator: @octavius octavius
item.description:
@octavius wrote:

item = 6737 Berserker_Ring A_ring_reputed_to_bring_out_a_berserk_fury_in_its_wearer. 6000 6000 8000 2 2 2 2 2 4 4 10 10 4 15

Why is it that when I add this into my item.cfg file it gives me the following error…

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException :17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:308) at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:36) at server.main(server.java:28)

But yet the item right before that one is:
item = 6735 Archer_Ring A_fabled_ring_that_improves_the_wearer’s_skill_with_a_bow. 6000 6000 8000 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 10 2 2

So I don’t understand why that one works but item id 6737 doesn’t… Can anyone help please?

Read full topic
